content: Lifestyle Multi Currency Cards Savings Asked by AnonymousAsked 1d agoAny recommendations of which e-wallet to use?I am thinking to start using an e-wallet and I'm currently using iOS so Samsung is not applicable.Considering Grab/Apple etc?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered 21h agoI currently do lots of payments with Favepay (and its tied to GrabPay). They used to have some really good rebates where I would spend say 5 transactions of $5 each and I would get $3 cashback which is not bad. The current reward is now 10 transactions of $3 for a $1 rebate which is quite sad imo.
Other than that, paying with Grab for food avails more points, which is always a plus!0 comments1

SLSamuel Lee, Financial Planner at Advisor Alliance Group (AIA)Level 3. WonderkidAnswered 1d agoI would recommend grab for the following reason:Its partnership with Favepay, allowing you to get cashback through fave and grab points through Grab!0 comments1
